hey ken,

for your robot dual domain, does each piece of food require an input 
into the neural network? does 1 node take in the range to 1 piece of 
food? lastly, if you you changed the environment such that there was 
a random number of food how would the neural network take that into 
account. i guess basically i want to understand how your radar type 
vision works that you mentioned in my last posting. thanks

timmy
